'''Ranetti''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Ranetti is currently at the Koro River Delta, trying to bury a foul, cursed blade called the [Pukestabber](/pukestabber/), after it ruined his ship, crew, and at least two of his finest coats.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
* Ranetti is encountered at the Koro River Delta on the island to the southwest. He's an old friend of Serafen's and in dialogue, you can obtain the [Pukestabber](/pukestabber/) from him for 8100 cp.
}}
